description._content: Title: Paris-Calais boat train Creator: Ewing Galloway, N.Y. Date: ca. 1912-1914 Place: Caffiers-Guines, France Part Of: David Goodyear collection of foreign railroad photographs Description: This is an excellent view of a Paris-Calais boat train. No. 31156 is one of the northern railway's first series of ''pacifics'' (engines with four small wheels in the front, six driving wheels in the middle and two trailing wheels). Source: Collyns, Adrian H. Northern Steam Vapeurs du Nord. DeGolyer Library, Southern Methodist University, 2003. Physical Description: 1 photograph: black and white; 15 x 21 cm. File: ag1983_0266_24_01_05r_paris_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/rwy,704 View Railroads: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/rwy
